body_html:
Hope someone can help me out here – i'm bound to TF 1.4 since only that version works (for now) on macOS (I know macOS isn't officially supported anymore, but it works fine if you follow certain instructions).

I manually fixed the WORKSPACE file with the mentioned cherry-pick, but i still get this error:
Current Bazel version is 0.10.0-homebrew, expected at least 0.5.4

Do i also have to change any other files? Would love to switch to TF 1.5, but compiling still fails. Installed TF 1.4 a month ago (but just for python2, now i need it for python3 too) and everything works fine there.

I manually fixed the WORKSPACE file with the mentioned cherry-pick, but i still get this error:

body:
Hope someone can help me out here – i'm bound to TF 1.4 since only that version works (for now) on macOS (I know macOS isn't officially supported anymore, but it works fine if you follow certain instructions).

I manually fixed the WORKSPACE file with the mentioned cherry-pick, but i still get this error:
```Current Bazel version is 0.10.0-homebrew, expected at least 0.5.4```

**Do i also have to change any other files?** Would love to switch to TF 1.5, but compiling still fails. Installed TF 1.4 a month ago (but just for python2, now i need it for python3 too) and everything works fine there.
